name: @native/offscreen-webview-sdk
description: A cross-platform WebView SDK for React Native, Android, iOS, and Web platforms

scripts.build:android: npm run build && cd native/android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && cd native/ios && xcodebuild -workspace OffscreenWebView.xcworkspace -scheme OffscreenWebView -configuration Release -sdk iphoneos -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' archive -archivePath OffscreenWebView.xcarchive
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:android && npm run build:ios
